remarks: Lemma for ~ kur14 .  Since the set ` T ` is closed under closure and complement, it contains the minimal set ` S ` as a subset, so ` S ` also has at most ` 1 4 ` elements.  (Indeed ` S = T ` , and it's not hard to prove this, but we don't need it for this proof.)  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2015.)
